description: Fantasy Survivor League - Mystery SAFE Weeks Seeds

verification.instructions: To verify any week's result: 1) Hash the seed with SHA-256, 2) Convert to 256-bit integer, 3) Calculate threshold = (remaining_safes * 2^256) / remaining_weeks, 4) If hash < threshold then SAFE, else CHOP
verification.commitment_calculation: SHA-256 hash of concatenated seeds: week1seed+week2seed+...+week17seed

notes.fallback: If MNF is not available, use SNF or latest game of the week
notes.integrity: Seeds published before season start - cannot be changed without breaking commitment hash
